We perform detailed analysis on an experiment utilizing the fully-coupled GFDL CM3 climate model, and we supplement this with results from an atmosphere-only GFDL AM3 experiment as well as relevant results from Phase 5 of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project (CMIP5)
